name: Bartholomew  Advisors SCS
goal: Bartholomew Advisors provides senior level EU public affairs consultancy services for the private sector in the areas of internet, telecommunications, new and traditional media. Focus is on the EU Council of Ministers and the European Commission.
interests: Business and Industry, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: Artificial intelligence, Platform regulation, ePrivacy, eCommerce, eJustice, Telecoms and 5G rollout,   Cybersecurity,  AVMSD, ePrivacy, Data protection and retention, Digital Sovereignty
